changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE screening_schedules ADD CONSTRAINT screening_schedules_day_of_month_check CHECK (day_of_month >=1 AND day_of_month <= 31)
ALTER TABLE screening_schedules ADD CONSTRAINT screening_schedules_hour_of_day_check CHECK (hour_of_day >=0 AND hour_of_day < 24)

INSERT INTO person_beneficial_owners ( beneficial_owner_id, middle_name, first_name, last_name, ssn, birth_dt, hired_at, relationship_type_code ) SELECT beneficial_owner_id, middle_name, first_name, last_name, ssn, birth_dt, hired_at, relationship_type_code FROM beneficial_owner WHERE person_ind = 'Y';
INSERT INTO organization_beneficial_owners ( beneficial_owner_id, fein, legal_name) SELECT beneficial_owner_id, fein, legal_name FROM beneficial_owner WHERE person_ind = 'N';

rollback.sql: UPDATE beneficial_owner bo SET person_ind = (SELECT 'Y' FROM person_beneficial_owners WHERE beneficial_owner_id = bo.beneficial_owner_id), middle_name = (SELECT middle_name FROM person_beneficial_owners WHERE beneficial_owner_id = bo.beneficial_owner_id), first_name = (SELECT first_name FROM person_beneficial_owners WHERE beneficial_owner_id = bo.beneficial_owner_id), last_name = (SELECT last_name FROM person_beneficial_owners WHERE beneficial_owner_id = bo.beneficial_owner_id), ssn = (SELECT ssn FROM person_beneficial_owners WHERE beneficial_owner_id = bo.beneficial_owner_id), birth_dt = (SELECT birth_dt FROM person_beneficial_owners WHERE beneficial_owner_id = bo.beneficial_owner_id), hired_at = (SELECT hired_at FROM person_beneficial_owners WHERE beneficial_owner_id = bo.beneficial_owner_id), relationship_type_code = (SELECT relationship_type_code FROM beneficial_owner WHERE beneficial_owner_id = bo.beneficial_owner_id) WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM person_beneficial_owners pbo WHERE pbo.beneficial_owner_id = bo.beneficial_owner_id ); UPDATE beneficial_owner bo SET person_ind = (SELECT 'N' FROM organization_beneficial_owners WHERE beneficial_owner_id = bo.beneficial_owner_id), fein = (SELECT fein FROM organization_beneficial_owners WHERE beneficial_owner_id = bo.beneficial_owner_id), legal_name = (SELECT legal_name FROM organization_beneficial_owners WHERE beneficial_owner_id = bo.beneficial_owner_id) WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM organization_beneficial_owners obo WHERE obo.beneficial_owner_id = bo.beneficial_owner_id );
